synopsis.text: Virtual Station is a futuristic laboratory focused on gathering and researching DNA to virtually reconstruct the ancient world. Yui is one of the young "Gene Divers" who enters these virtual realities to collect the DNA of extinct animals. However, an incident occurs when Yui tries to exit the virtual world during a maintenance cycle but is instead transferred to a dangerous new virtual present. In this out-of-control simulation, an intelligent species of evolved rodents called the Puglaistig has emerged. Viewing humans as a threat, the Puglaistig hatch a plot to travel back to the very dawn of mankind and prevent human evolution. Now, Yui and her friends must race against time to thwart the Puglaistig's nefarious plans and save the future of humankind. With vivid virtual settings spanning eras and exotic species, this anime promises thrilling adventures exploring the boundaries of science and nature. Will Yui and her allies manage to overcome the menacing Puglaistig? Or will the course of human history be forever altered?
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
